item.description:
Karen Ranzi, MA, CCC/Sp, lecturer, teacher and author, will be featured at the next Optimum Health Solution/ Raw New England Community Dinner Speaker Series on Tuesday, June 16, 5:30 – 9:30 p.m., at UMass Waltham Center, 240 Beaver St., Waltham 02452. Karen Ranzi, speaking on “Creating healthy Children” presents many values nature has given us to restore our children’s health through solid nutritional principles. www.SuperHealthyChildren.com.

Added feature at 6 pm, renowned chef, Joseph Lucier will present food demo and give samples of A “Green Giant” Chocolate Shake for you and kids to sample.

Cost $10 with an organic, unprocessed, raw/vegan/non-animal based dish to feed 8 or $10 extra without food. Questions, call Betsy Bragg 781-899-6664 or cell 617-835-2913 or email betsy@optimumhealthsolution.org. (For directions, see Calendar of Events in www.OptimumHealthSolution.org.)

This is usually a large event. Please wear a "Meetup" button or sticker (purchase Meetup button or make your own sticker), look for people wearing "Meetup" buttons or stickers, try to recognize faces from profile photos (post your own photo so people can recoginze you), introduce yourself, and enjoy! :)

Posted by Martha Muehe (www.essenic.org)
item.how_to_find_us: Please wear Meetup button (click Promote on left), introduce yourself, & enjoy!
item.name: Potluck/Talk: Karen Ranzi
